title: Flag of Slovenia
cardDescription: The national flag of Slovenia features three equal horizontal bands of white (top), blue, and red, with the Slovenian coat of arms located in the upper hoist side of the flag centered in the white and blue bands.
description: The national flag of Slovenia features three equal horizontal bands of white (top), blue, and red, with the Slovenian coat of arms located in the upper hoist side of the flag centered in the white and blue bands. The coat of arms is a shield with the image of Mount Triglav, Slovenia's highest peak, in white against a blue background at the center.

content.content: This pattern is worked horizontally starting from top left.

content: With A, ch 30, sc in 2nd ch and each ch across, turn
Ch 1, sc 18, sab, sc 4, sba, sc 5, turn
Ch 1, sc 4, sab, sc 4, sba, sc 19, turn
Ch 1, sc 18, sab, sba, sc 2, sab, sba, sc 4, sab, turn
Ch 1, sc 4, [sba, sab] x 3, sc 19, turn
Ch 1, sc 19, [sba, sab] x 2, sc 6, turn
Ch 1, sc 6, sba, sab, sc 21, turn

content.content: For help with the pattern, please see the General Instructions from the main page:
